column1: This position demands a higher writing ability , so please say something about your writing ability .
column2: Of course . I've loved writing since I was a very little boy . I won the first prize in a national composition contest when I was in middle school . After attending Nanjing University , I never give up writing . My works , such as Father's Tobacco Pipe , Open Air Cinema , The old City were respectively published China Youth Daily , Yangzi Evening News , and New Beijing . During the period of studying for my degrees of master and doctor , I paid more attention to developing my research ability and published several papers . The Impact of Internet in Chinese Political Participation , The Discipline of Remold , The Historical Direction of Chinese Administration Reform , Bribery Cases of Self governance in Chinese Villages are respectively published in Chinese Publish Administration , Beijing Due Xuebao , Theory and Society and Chinese Reform . I joined in Yangzi Evening News to work as a part-time journalist in 2006 . During this period , I've written a lot of comments , which improved my writing ability to a new level , I have full confidence in my writing ability , and I believe I can do the job well .

column1: Have you got any experience in advertising ? EOS Yes , I have been working in the Public Relations Section of a company in the past two years . I plan the advertising campaign and cooperate the work of artists and typographers . Sometimes I have to do the work of a specialist when there ' s something urgent . EOS Do you have any practical experience as a secretary ? EOS Yes , sir . I acted as a secretary in an insurance company . EOS Would you tell me the essential qualities a secretary should maintain ?
column2: Well , to begin with , I would say she needs to be diligent , and the second point is that she has to do a lot of things on her own initiative . Finally , she can make notes in shorthand and types and has the skills in report writing , summary writing , keep minutes at meetings , and so on . Most important of all is that she seems to have a better memory than average .

column1: Have you got any experience in advertising ? EOS Yes , I have been working in the Public Relations Section of a company in the past two years . I plan the advertising campaign and cooperate the work of artists and typographers . Sometimes I have to do the work of a specialist when there ' s something urgent . EOS Do you have any practical experience as a secretary ? EOS Yes , sir . I acted as a secretary in an insurance company . EOS Would you tell me the essential qualities a secretary should maintain ? EOS Well , to begin with , I would say she needs to be diligent , and the second point is that she has to do a lot of things on her own initiative . Finally , she can make notes in shorthand and types and has the skills in report writing , summary writing , keep minutes at meetings , and so on . Most important of all is that she seems to have a better memory than average . EOS Have you had any experience with computer ? EOS Yes , I studied in a computer training program , and can process data through the computer . EOS That's fine . What about operating the fax and duplicator ?
column2: I can handle them without any trouble

column1: Hi , George . I'm going to have a job interview next week . Could you give me some advice ?
column2: Sure . First of all , it ' s very important for you not to be late . Job interviewers usually don ' t think very highly of a candidate who arrives ten minutes after the appointed time , only to explain that he could not find the place or that there was heavy traffic .

For example , you should take care to appear well-groomed and modestly dressed . Avoid the extremes of a too elaborate or too casual style . This will put you on the same level as other applicants and make the interviewer consider more important qualifications . EOS But I love wearing T-shirts and jeans . EOS I advise you not to wear a too casual style when going to an interview . Informal clothes as well as torn jeans and dirty shoes convey the impression that you are not serious about the job , or that you may be casual about your work as you are about your clothes . Clothes which are too colorful or too expensive suggest that you do not understand what behavior is appropriate for the job , or that you are snobbish or frivolous . EOS I know what you mean . I ought to wear right clothes at the right time .
column2: You got it . Only in this way can you gain the respect of the interviewer and his confidence in your judgement .

After I consulted the customer , I completed a customer inquiry form and catalogued the information in our database . I then collaborated with colleagues to prepare the best possible package for the client . The clients were then presented with a summarized report on their financial activities that I formulated on a quarterly basis . EOS What is your greatest strength ? EOS I am an excellent communicator . People trust me and come to me for advice . One afternoon , my colleague was involved with a troublesome customer who felt he was not being served well . I made the customer a cup of coffee and invited both my colleague and the client to my desk where we solved the problem together . EOS What is your greatest weakness ? EOS I tend to spend too much time making sure the customer is satisfied . However , I began setting time-limits for myself . EOS Why do you want to work for our company ?
column2: After following your firm's progress for the last 3 years , I am convinced that your company is becoming one of the market leaders and I would like to be a part of that team .

EOS My first name is J-U-D-Y , and my last name is W-A-N-G . EOS Please note that this ticket has a penalty of $ 75 for any change or cancellation . EOS It ' s OK . Where should I pay for the penalty ? EOS At the airport . OK , Miss . Wang , your Flight 8 on July 19 from Taipei to Minneapolis is canceled . Your new reservation is Trans Pacific Flight 8 from Taipei to Minneapolis at 9 thirty a . m . on August 2 . EOS That ' s 1POJ7403 .
column2: That ' s correct .

If you'll excuse me , I'd like to go it over first . ( After about 15 minutes ) Hmm , you've done a pretty good job . It's well prepared . EOS Thank you . EOS Well , I suggest that we discuss only the clauses and points where we have different opinions just to save time . EOS That's a good idea . EOS First , let's read Clause Two about packing . It's our usual practice to ship our products in containers . That'll save time and money , but your contract stipulates the use of wooden cases . So , we'd like to have the words containers are allowed in the contract . EOS Agreed .
column2: For shipment , you know we are producing a complete set of equipment for you and it won't all be finished at one time . So would you allow us to make partial shipments .

column1: I would like to take this opportunity to welcome Monica to our company and introduce her to her department and colleagues . She has lots of working experiences as an accountant and I am sure everybody in the department can benefit from this .

I am very happy to meet everyone and I am looking forward to working well with all of you . I am very happy to be one of the team and I will do my best to get into the working situation as soon as possible . By the way , call me Monica . Everybody calls me so .

column1: Margaret , I'd like to follow up with the arrangements for our company retreat , to take place next month . We need to book the venue , make arrangements for speakers and door prizes , and set up all the activities and accommodations . Also , very important , we need to determine which of our staff will be eligible and will be available to go . We've got to get a head count in order to make reservations .
column2: What's the criteria for staff to attend ? Are we only including our management team in this affair ? Or will we be extending invitations to lower level employees to attend ?

column1: Margaret , I'd like to follow up with the arrangements for our company retreat , to take place next month . We need to book the venue , make arrangements for speakers and door prizes , and set up all the activities and accommodations . Also , very important , we need to determine which of our staff will be eligible and will be available to go . We've got to get a head count in order to make reservations . EOS What's the criteria for staff to attend ? Are we only including our management team in this affair ? Or will we be extending invitations to lower level employees to attend ?
column2: Lower level employees need not attend . The purpose of this retreat is for training , especially for our management team . We want to develop a well-oiled machine on our executive level . In order to get everyone to jell together , we've got to include some fun . That's the reason for the retreat .

EOS No , I've deliberately kept a balance between various exercises ; parallel bars , push-ups , sit-ups , bunny-hops , five-kilometer run , and so on . I alternate them over the weekdays . Sometimes , when I find myself in a bad state , I will simply idle about in the park .
column2: Why don't you just stay in bed when you are feeling unfit for exercising ?

column1: You are an early bird , Tom . What do you do in the morning then ? EOS Exercise . The morning hours are the most precious period within a single day . We should not pass them up easily . Seize the time and do something useful . EOS So , you choose to spend it on bodybuilding . Where do you exercise ? EOS Usually , I run to the Black Bamboo Park as a warm-up . Admission is free . Then I start my activities . EOS Do you do the same exercises every day ? EOS No , I've deliberately kept a balance between various exercises ; parallel bars , push-ups , sit-ups , bunny-hops , five-kilometer run , and so on . I alternate them over the weekdays . Sometimes , when I find myself in a bad state , I will simply idle about in the park . EOS Why don't you just stay in bed when you are feeling unfit for exercising ?
column2: It's not easy to keep a good habit , you know . I fear that if I fail to get up early one day , I may find it still more difficult to rise early the next . Besides , a mere walk in the early morning is much fun , too . Here and there in the park , you meet whole gangs of senior citizens who might be singing operas or old songs , playing er'hu , chess , or just chatting and gossiping . It's interesting to join them .

EOS Oh , they look just like live cranes .
column2: And what is more , in traditional Chinese thinking , cranes and pine trees symbolize longevity .

Seeing is believing . EOS I've heard some friends say when they get the article , it's quite different from what they see on the website advertisement . EOS That happens . Without close quality examination , we may encounter fraud , and the e-shop may suddenly disappear . EOS What's more , it's not always so safe for us to pay online as hackers might steal the user name and password . EOS It's said that some measures have been taken to deal with this problem . Paying online is much safer than before , but I still have the feeling that it's not safe enough . EOS I can't agree more . that's why I only do street shopping . EOS Me too . Sometimes I surf online shops to check some related information , and then go to a physical store to do the actual shopping .
column2: That's a good idea .

column1: So tell me , what's the difference between the Board of Directors , the CEO , and the stockholders ? They all seems ot be the same group of people to me ...
column2: No , there's a definite difference . You know , the stockholders are the people who own the company ... they're the financial control system . Then there's the CEO - the chief executive officer . He's the hot shot , the main guy who is the boss . If there is only one person with absolute power in the organization , everyone knows that the power will go to their head . It's too dangerous . That's the reason for a Board of Directors . The board is made up of people who are experts in the industry . They could be related to the organization , but more commonly , they are independent and non-biased .

column1: So tell me , what's the difference between the Board of Directors , the CEO , and the stockholders ? They all seems ot be the same group of people to me ... EOS No , there's a definite difference . You know , the stockholders are the people who own the company ... they're the financial control system . Then there's the CEO - the chief executive officer . He's the hot shot , the main guy who is the boss . If there is only one person with absolute power in the organization , everyone knows that the power will go to their head . It's too dangerous . That's the reason for a Board of Directors . The board is made up of people who are experts in the industry . They could be related to the organization , but more commonly , they are independent and non-biased .
column2: How many people are on the board of directors ?

column1: So tell me , what's the difference between the Board of Directors , the CEO , and the stockholders ? They all seems ot be the same group of people to me ... EOS No , there's a definite difference . You know , the stockholders are the people who own the company ... they're the financial control system . Then there's the CEO - the chief executive officer . He's the hot shot , the main guy who is the boss . If there is only one person with absolute power in the organization , everyone knows that the power will go to their head . It's too dangerous . That's the reason for a Board of Directors . The board is made up of people who are experts in the industry . They could be related to the organization , but more commonly , they are independent and non-biased . EOS How many people are on the board of directors ?
column2: Usually not more than 15 , not less than 10 . They meet monthly , quarterly , or biannually to oversee an organization or company . They provide long term planing and vision , and also act as moral watchdogs rto keep the company in line .

column1: Welcome . What can I do for you , Madam ? EOS I hope you can give me some advice . I'm sick and tired of coming here or to the post office to pay my utility bills . It's such a long way from my home , but I checked and you are my nearest branch . Is there anyway I can do it from home ?
column2: That's terrible . Unfortunately , we don't have that many branches outside the centre of town . What I'd advise you to do is set up a Direct Debit Service .

EOS Exporters must ensure that their product satisfies customers ' needs , wants and likes . EOS Ah , some products are successful at home , but not be popular overseas . EOS That's because the fashion , taste and social customs and so on vary considerably . EOS Yes , sometimes the differences are great . EOS Well , we should be in accordance with national conditions and adjust the product .
column2: We have to ensure that the product should be attractive to guarantee sales .

Last week , I had to call the plumber to fix the toilet . Anyway , all par for the course when you own a house , I guess . I think I am going to hire an interior decorator to look the place over . EOS I've studied home decoration as a hobby . Could I make some suggestions ?
column2: Go right ahead .

Now , let me listen to your pulse . Mm , do you feel weak ?
column2: Yes , I never seem to have any energy .

column1: Now , what seems to be the trouble ? EOS It's nothing serious . But I always have a headache , and I haven't slept properly for several weeks . I've also lost appetite and my eyes are burning . EOS Mm , you do look rather pale . Let me take your temperature . Would you put the thermometer under your arm , please ? Now , let me listen to your pulse . Mm , do you feel weak ? EOS Yes , I never seem to have any energy .
column2: I'll give you a blood test . Would you roll up your sleeve ? Just as I thought . You're anemic . You'd better pay more attention to your diet . Eat plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables and food high in protein . And don't stay up late working . Try to get more rest .

You're anemic . You'd better pay more attention to your diet . Eat plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables and food high in protein . And don't stay up late working . Try to get more rest .
column2: Thank you .

column1: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest .
column2: Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much ? The same is true in the West .

column1: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest . EOS Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much ? The same is true in the West .
column2: No , absolutely not ! On the contrary , you'll be considered a well-connected , sociable man , if you keep involved in the conversation all the time . But always pay attention to what you say . If the table has a senior guest , say something as upbeat and cheerful as possible . Or maybe , you may give the floor to him and keep listening as if very interested .

column1: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest . EOS Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much ? The same is true in the West . EOS No , absolutely not ! On the contrary , you'll be considered a well-connected , sociable man , if you keep involved in the conversation all the time . But always pay attention to what you say . If the table has a senior guest , say something as upbeat and cheerful as possible . Or maybe , you may give the floor to him and keep listening as if very interested .
column2: You mean , keeping a low profile in the presence of the old ? That goes in like with Confucius ' preachings , right ?

column1: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest . EOS Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much ? The same is true in the West . EOS No , absolutely not ! On the contrary , you'll be considered a well-connected , sociable man , if you keep involved in the conversation all the time . But always pay attention to what you say . If the table has a senior guest , say something as upbeat and cheerful as possible . Or maybe , you may give the floor to him and keep listening as if very interested . EOS You mean , keeping a low profile in the presence of the old ? That goes in like with Confucius ' preachings , right ?
column2: Correct . Show respect for the older people . Conventionally , before the meal starts , the younger members are supposed to address each one of the elderly members of the table one by one . Others are kept in waiting until the most venerable guest proclaim the beginning of the meal and takes the first bite . Toasts also go to these men first before people can toast to each other .

column2: Any other rules to observe in order to keep modest ?

column1: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest . EOS Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much ? The same is true in the West . EOS No , absolutely not ! On the contrary , you'll be considered a well-connected , sociable man , if you keep involved in the conversation all the time . But always pay attention to what you say . If the table has a senior guest , say something as upbeat and cheerful as possible . Or maybe , you may give the floor to him and keep listening as if very interested . EOS You mean , keeping a low profile in the presence of the old ? That goes in like with Confucius ' preachings , right ? EOS Correct . Show respect for the older people . Conventionally , before the meal starts , the younger members are supposed to address each one of the elderly members of the table one by one . Others are kept in waiting until the most venerable guest proclaim the beginning of the meal and takes the first bite . Toasts also go to these men first before people can toast to each other . EOS Any other rules to observe in order to keep modest ?
column2: Yes , plenty of them . Don't eat fast ! People usually keep their dining pace accorded with others . And all the dishes should not be eaten up completely .

Is there anything else we need to order while I am at it ? EOS I think the only thing is toner . Try to see if they can deliver it before the end of business day tomorrow . We should really try to do better about waiting until the last minute to fill orders that are usually made on a monthly basis . Anyhow , see what you can do to expedite the order this time .
column2: OK , will do .

column1: Stupid girl , making me spend so much money , now I have to get it from the ATM ... EOS Hello , welcome to Universal Bank . Please insert your card into the slot . EOS I know where to put my card ! Stupid machine , talking to me like I ' m an idiot ... EOS Please input your 6 digit PIN code followed by the pound key . Thank you . Please select an option.Thank you . You have selected withdrawal . EOS Yeah , yeah , I know what I selected . Just gimme my money ! EOS Please type the amount you would like to withdraw . Thank you , you want to transfer 10000 USD to the World Wildlife Foundation . If this is correct please press 1 . EOS No , no ! Stupid machine , what are you doing ! No ! EOS Confirmed . Thank you for using our bank ! Please remove your card from the slot . Goodbye ! EOS No , no way ! What happened ? Give me my money !
column2: Danger , danger ! The exits have been sealed and the doors will remain locked in until the local authorities arrive . Thank you for using our bank . Have a nice day .

EOS I ' ll be here for approximately three weeks . See , here ' s my return ticket for the twenty-sixth of March . EOS And , who is sponsoring your trip ? EOS My brother , here , this is an invitation letter from him . I will stay with him and his family in their home . EOS Alright , tell me about the ties you have to your home country . EOS Well , I own a house . actually , I ' m leaving my dog there with my neighbors . I have a car at home , and oh , my job ! I ' m employed by Tornal as an engineer . Actually , I only have three weeks ' vacation , so I have to go back to work at the end of March .
column2: And what evidence do you have that you are financially independent ?

I won ' t go into detail , but it wasn ' t serious . EOS I really dislike going to a doctor or to a hospital . EOS I think most people are a little nervous about it . I was really very , very nervous just before I had the operation , but the anaesthetist gave me an anaesthetic and the next thing I remember was waking up after the operation . EOS It must have really hurt afterwards . EOS Well , the nurse game me plenty of painkillers , but it did feel uncomfortable . I wasn ' t permitted to eat anything for 48 hours . That was the worse thing . EOS I bet you were ready for a thick juicy steak when you got out of hospital . EOS I certainly was ! However , the doctor gave me a list of food I couldn ' t eat for another 72 hours , and steak was on the list ! EOS Is there any pain now ? EOS No , not at all . I stopped taking painkillers after a couple of days .
column2: Did they take good care of you in the hospital ?

It sounds like you've done a lot of planning in a very short time . EOS Yes , there is a lot of to be taken care of---wedding photos , wedding dress , catering , transport , hotel , etc ... EOS Is everything ready now ?
column2: Almost . The only thing that isn't ready is the hotel . As a lot of people have chosen that day to get married , it is hard to find a hotel that isn't too expensive .

column1: Did you set your clock forward for daylight savings time ?
column2: What ? Why do we have to do that ?

column1: Did you set your clock forward for daylight savings time ? EOS What ? Why do we have to do that ?
column2: Well , at the start of the spring we usually have more daylight in the mornings and less in the afternoon . This is basically due to our position on the planet and the rotation of the earth . In any case , to take better advantage of the daylight available , we compensate by moving our clocks forward one hour .

column1: Did you set your clock forward for daylight savings time ? EOS What ? Why do we have to do that ? EOS Well , at the start of the spring we usually have more daylight in the mornings and less in the afternoon . This is basically due to our position on the planet and the rotation of the earth . In any case , to take better advantage of the daylight available , we compensate by moving our clocks forward one hour .
column2: I see . That ' s convenient ! I never understood things like this , such as GMT . I never know what time zone we are in or when to change my clock !

column1: Did you set your clock forward for daylight savings time ? EOS What ? Why do we have to do that ? EOS Well , at the start of the spring we usually have more daylight in the mornings and less in the afternoon . This is basically due to our position on the planet and the rotation of the earth . In any case , to take better advantage of the daylight available , we compensate by moving our clocks forward one hour . EOS I see . That ' s convenient ! I never understood things like this , such as GMT . I never know what time zone we are in or when to change my clock !
column2: That just stands for Greenwich Mean Time . Here in California , we are in Pacific Standard Time , that is eight time zones west of Greenwich . Remember when we were in Beijing ? Well , then we were in China Standard Time , and that ' s eight time zones east of Greenwich !

column1: Did you set your clock forward for daylight savings time ? EOS What ? Why do we have to do that ? EOS Well , at the start of the spring we usually have more daylight in the mornings and less in the afternoon . This is basically due to our position on the planet and the rotation of the earth . In any case , to take better advantage of the daylight available , we compensate by moving our clocks forward one hour . EOS I see . That ' s convenient ! I never understood things like this , such as GMT . I never know what time zone we are in or when to change my clock ! EOS That just stands for Greenwich Mean Time . Here in California , we are in Pacific Standard Time , that is eight time zones west of Greenwich . Remember when we were in Beijing ? Well , then we were in China Standard Time , and that ' s eight time zones east of Greenwich !
column2: That ' s why it was so weird traveling from Beijing to LA ! Because of the huge time difference , even though we left Beijing at noon and flew for more than eight hours , we still arrived in LA the same day at noon ! It ' s like we went back in time !

column2: Wait , there ' s more ! Then you need to introduce and describe your goods or services . What they are and how they are different from competitors ' ? All this information is useful so that you can move on to your strategy and implementation stage , where you will describe in detail how you will actually execute your idea .

column1: It's hard to be optimistic about things with the way the economy's headed ... The trade deficit is getting larger , consumption's down , I really think we're headed for a recession .
column2: The economy has been stagnant for a while now . We've been in a recessive state for several months already . What worries me the most is the trade deficit . I think the government should do more to encourage exports .

column1: It's hard to be optimistic about things with the way the economy's headed ... The trade deficit is getting larger , consumption's down , I really think we're headed for a recession . EOS The economy has been stagnant for a while now . We've been in a recessive state for several months already . What worries me the most is the trade deficit . I think the government should do more to encourage exports .
column2: Increasing exports would weaken the currency . I think the main point is economic growth . We need more jobs . Factories have outsourced and moved many jobs to foreign countries . The result is an increase in unemployment in our own country , lower consumption , lower production , and an overall feeble economy . If more people are working , it will give the economy a boost .

column1: It's hard to be optimistic about things with the way the economy's headed ... The trade deficit is getting larger , consumption's down , I really think we're headed for a recession . EOS The economy has been stagnant for a while now . We've been in a recessive state for several months already . What worries me the most is the trade deficit . I think the government should do more to encourage exports . EOS Increasing exports would weaken the currency . I think the main point is economic growth . We need more jobs . Factories have outsourced and moved many jobs to foreign countries . The result is an increase in unemployment in our own country , lower consumption , lower production , and an overall feeble economy . If more people are working , it will give the economy a boost .
column2: It's true that we should do something about unemployment , but what about inflation ? If unemployment falls , there's pressure to increase pay . That would result in inflation , which would result in a much less dynamic economy .
